messages.message:
Awesome Tech Start up -RevolutionParts

Hi Brian, 

I work for RevolutionParts, a tech start up based in PHX, AZ. We’ve been shaking up the automotive industry with a revolutionary platform that’s already helped hundreds of dealerships sell $300 Million in auto parts online.

We are experiencing a ton of growth and we are looking to bring on a Software Engineer. I across your profile and I was extremely impressed with your experience! We have an awesome company culture, and I think you'd really like the work we're doing here (PHP, APIs, node.js, AWS...etc) 

If you have time and/or interest I would love to schedule a time to discuss this awesome opportunity forward. Please use this link to set something directly on my calendar. https://calendly.com/khuntoon 

If you are not interested but know of someone who would be a good fit please pass along my information. 

www.revolutionparts.com 

Competitive pay 
Competitive benefits
Unlimited vacation 
Career growth
Unlimited snacks and beverages
Catered lunch and beer Fridays

Katelyn Huntoon
khuntoon@revolutionparts.com
989-292-1374
Katelyn, thanks for reaching out. I’d love to hear more about this.
That is great! Can you please schedule a 30 minute meeting on my calendar using this link https://calendly.com/khuntoon
